tasks.task_description: Analyze current SEO implementation in BaseLayout and other components
Check existing meta tags, Open Graph, and structured data
Optimize meta descriptions and titles for better search visibility
Add missing structured data (JSON-LD) for blog posts and photography
Implement proper canonical URLs and hreflang tags
Add robots.txt and improve sitemap generation
Optimize images with proper alt tags and lazy loading

description: SEO optimization for Joey's Notes Astro blog - improve search engine visibility and performance
context: Analyzed current SEO implementation. Found: BaseLayout has basic meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and canonical URLs. Missing: robots.txt, structured data (JSON-LD), optimized meta descriptions, and enhanced image SEO. PostLayout passes SEO data to SpotlightLayout but lacks structured data for articles.

Completed major SEO optimizations: Added robots.txt, created SEO utility with structured data generation, enhanced BaseLayout with better meta tags and structured data support, updated PostLayout to generate blog post structured data, optimized homepage description, and improved image SEO with proper alt tags and lazy loading.

Completed SEO optimization tasks: Enhanced sitemap configuration with proper settings (changefreq, priority, lastmod), successfully built project with 52 pages generated, validated sitemap generation with proper XML structure including all posts and tag pages, and confirmed development server starts correctly with all SEO improvements.
